name: Embers Off
description:
Embers Off takes you to the most epic historical event in the times of World War II - the journey of the Indian National Army/Azaad Hind Fauj for their eminent ambition of acquiring India's independence from Britain. From the Japanese incursion of Singapore in 1942, this great story of INA began. The INA fought putting their lives at risk for the sake of love towards the nation.

Experience the war in an immersive way of cinematic story-telling with Hindi voice! The massive action and a heart-touching story would make you enter a state of heavy gratification.

Embers Off brings you a huge single-player campaign with enormous action and cinematic scenes.
